Smooth Products

A simple, lightweight, and responsive jQuery product image viewer by Kevin Thornbloom.

Features

  • Lightweight script
  • Animates to different image heights (see 4th item)
  • Click to zoom & pan image on desktop
  • Tap & drag to zoom & pan on mobile
  • Push the enlarge button to open the image in a lightbox
  • Responsive
  • Indicator for thumbnail currently open
